title: Reload eSports is now Recruiting!
body:
Reload eSports is looking for players and coaches to get involved in our League of Legends 
team. Reload is an eSports organisation looking to branch into multiple online games and we are looking for players, coaches and analysts to join our team!

We are trialing for all 5 positions, as well as 2 substitutes, to join the team. We will be training to reach the OPL in 2016. Players will have access to a Reload eSports Teamspeak and all competition entries paid for, as well as access to a video editor.

To apply you must be at least Diamond 1 +. Players can find more details on how to apply here: http://reloadesports.com/?page_id=7

Reload is also looking for more coaches and analysts to add to our current team. If you are interested in coaching or analysing you can find more information here:http://reloadesports.com/?page_id=2

If you have any questions, please contact us at:
management@reloadesports.com.au
https://www.facebook.com/ReloadESportsAustralia/

And if you'd like to find more information on Reload eSports you can find us at:
http://reloadesports.com/
http://www.twitch.tv/reloadesportsaustralia/
https://twitter.com/ReloadEsports
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRURoEdb1pjjvKRVC4Ryeqg
